about_the_game:
Give your skill instructors and commanding officers an adorable new look with the RPG Character Pack 16! Gee-kun-soft is back with another new set of 16 MV-style characters to add to your games, this time focusing on women who could be friends or foes.

Each character comes with walking and downed sprites, 13 front view enemy images with a variety of outfit colors, facesets and bust images with 8 different emotions, and SV battlers, so you can easily turn any of them into a new party member or the heroine of the whole story!

This pack also includes high resolution images of each character so you can resize them to perfectly fit your game’s screen size, or show them head-to-toe when your players first meet them. If you’ve been wanting to upgrade your NPCs or add new party members who are all dressed to impress, check out the RPG Character Pack 16!

Contents:

* Battlers with 13 variants each
* ​Busts and Facesets with 8 emotions each
* SV-animated battlers, Walking sprites
* Bonus portraits!
